# DevOps Review Skill

## Purpose
Analyzes and reviews DevOps practices, configurations, and workflows to ensure best practices and identify improvement opportunities.

## Capabilities
- Review CI/CD pipeline configurations
- Analyze infrastructure as code (IaC)
- Evaluate deployment strategies
- Assess monitoring and observability practices
- Review security and compliance configurations
- Identify automation opportunities

## Usage
Invoke this skill when you need to:
- Review pipeline configurations (GitHub Actions, Jenkins, etc.)
- Audit infrastructure code (Terraform, CloudFormation, etc.)
- Evaluate deployment processes
- Assess DevOps maturity and practices
